items.title: SCOTUS Signals Willingness To Side With Trump Admin In Asylum Cases Dispute

items.title: 10 Tips To Keep Smartphones From Making Your Kids Tired, Fat, And Miserable
items.description: A new study serves as a sobering warning to parents to avoid giving smartphones to their kids until absolutely necessary.

items.title: Wisconsin’s Lib-Led Supreme Court Stacks The Congressional Map Deck
items.description: The latest leftist gerrymander stunt should serve as a reminder to Republicans that failure to rewrite representation lines is not an option.
